title: What if Fizz's Shark become Little !?
body:
Finally finish drawing the galaxy fizz skin~ 
What should I draw next for this summer ? :D
Any comment and suggest ?

http://grabilla.com/06613-b75119d6-8196-4acd-9c8e-09bd32e192ca.png

replies.body: Draw Aurelion Sol experiencing his beloved stars from a brand new perspective: it's-too-dang-hot-out-stupid-summer-weather.

Jhin :D maybe the last bullet from his ult being the foreground and jhin holding his gun pointed at the viewer with the gun smoking or something. Not an artist but it would look awesome :D kinda similar to the S6 load screen with Caitlyn though
As a Fizz Main, I Approve
OH MY GOD ITS SO CUTE
cottontail fizz with a small bunny :D

I say do something pool party, it being summer and all ^_^.

Also good work!
Looks great! Maybe a underworld skin? (Of a champion you play a lot)
Or mafia, maybe an omega squad skin?
